text:
Black journalists reporting during this difficult time: we see you and we thank you. Deeply grateful for the work you are doing every day. 
https://www.glamour.com/story/8-black-women-journalists-on-reporting-police-brutality

RT @MeetThePress TUNE IN: A nation on the brink of a turning point? Co-founder of the Black Lives Matter movement, @aliciagarza joins for an exclusive interview. Plus, @SenBooker and @SmithsonianSec and Founding Director of @NMAAHC, Lonnie Bunch and Admiral James Stavridis. #MTP #IfItsSunday http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ6UKgsWoAAnDb8.jpg

Stone is heavy, and sand a burden,but a fool’s provocation is heavier than both.

Proverbs 27:3

Total incompetence. https://twitter.com/yarotrof/status/1269283042687725569 QT @yarotrof Trump visits the coronavirus swab production line in Maine, without a mask, and the manufacturer says it will now have to throw away the day’s output.  https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2020/06/05/trump-maine-puritan-throw-away-coronavirus-swabs/3153622001/

RT @JuliaCarmel__ The @NYCMayor announced this morning that the curfew has been lifted. 

There is thankfully no curfew in place tonight or for the foreseeable future.

RT @ZackFinkNews .@NYCMayor announces reforms of NYPD:

-Shift funding from NYPD to youth and social services 
-Repeal of 50-a ( making disciplinary records of NYPD public ) 
-Move vendor enforcement out of NYPD
-Bring community voices into NYPD leadership

RT @zellnor4ny THREAD: Now that curfew is lifted, it’s a good time to discuss reverse warrants. What's a reverse warrant you say? Basically, if you were in the vicinity of a suspected crime, the police can issue a warrant for your arrest. They “geolocate” you by using cell phone data. (1/6)
It’s past time for a national ban on chokeholds.

Elections are about the future. Every voter you register, every call you make, every postcard you mail, every text you send makes a difference. Make your voice heard and inspire others to get involved.-NP http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1269642992501035009/img/cKpEmTTmb9kiJ_RD.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269642992501035009/vid/320x400/j3WVSpaGzrbGh8g1.mp4?tag=13

RT @thehill Rep. @AOC: "We would not be giving local police departments who are undertrained A TANK if we didn't give the military too much money to have extra damn tanks lying around to begin with." http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ3D-b2XYAAHzey.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269386000482152454/vid/454x270/gBI1H9mjPxOHRH5n.mp4?tag=13

RT @ava Everyday. Everywhere. For. Black. People. This. Is. A. Very. Real. Possibility. 

White. People. Get. To. Ask. And. Argue. And. Assert. We. Must. Submit. And. Comply. Or. Else. https://twitter.com/_SJPeace_/status/1269352173663592449 QT @_SJPeace_ This 200lb white cop topped and choked out a black woman over a title transfer.

THE COP WORKS FOR BELLVUE POLICE DEPARTMENT IN WASHINGTON STATE!

WHO IS HE?

BLACK LIVES MATTER http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269351974857777152/pu/img/94y86ylkJtK7boWH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269351974857777152/pu/vid/320x320/YVdxhfXuYf7xDHXE.mp4?tag=10

Hope y’all take a moment to check out my interview with @Ami_Magazine where I discussed my call for an investigation into NYC’s Mayor unjust targeting of the Jewish community, the disturbing rise of #antiSemitism throughout the country & more.

Sure, he was the orginal anti-fascist. He defeated Hitler & the Nazis. And he saved the free world.

But you’re an angry, woke Lefty protestor (probably with a trust fund)—and you have a can of spray paint—so your contributions to humanity & equality are about the same. https://twitter.com/dawkinsreturns/status/1269661639869153281 QT @DawkinsReturns They've defaced Churchill! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269661600946049030/pu/img/qQt4CX-PPVufUzi5.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269661600946049030/pu/vid/320x606/Aw9TehA9CzIlri3P.mp4?tag=10

It is wrong to deny families the right to grieve together, to comfort their loved ones in times of sickness or death. Enough is enough. https://twitter.com/blueboxdave/status/1269628738439991296 QT @BlueBoxDave Denying families the right to grieve together while protesters dance in the streets is an act of horrible cruelty by our government.  https://thefederalist.com/2020/06/07/the-lockdowns-are-now-intentional-cruelty/

RT @elielcruz A year ago today our community lost #LayleenPolanco, a 27-year-old Afro-Latinx trans woman was pronounced dead in a solitary confinement cell at Rikers. I am angry and committed to continuing to support her family as they seek justice for her death. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1269632324829884416/img/w7yqpfA4dQoynf_M.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269632324829884416/vid/480x270/0APngeR2LTzkp1tH.mp4?tag=13

As a state Attorney General who opened pattern and practice investigations into repeated police misconduct and excessive use of force, I know how necessary these investigations are to systematically reforming our country's police departments from the inside out.

Structural racism affects every part of our health care system—and this pandemic has only exacerbated the disparities that Black communities face.

https://www.vox.com/2020/6/2/21277987/coronavirus-in-black-people-covid-19-testing-treatment-medical-racism
Black women killed at the hands of law enforcement cannot be forgotten in our fight for justice. #Saytheirnames https://time.com/5847970/police-brutality-black-women-girls/

RT @texasdemocrats "When we ask the question 'how can we win?' it's not a mystery to Democrats. We know how we can make that possible -- it begins with making sure we push our country to our highest ideals. Not only with words, but deeds." -- @JulianCastro #tdp20 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ2HU5FWsAM1hx7.jpg

RT @yashar Congressman John Lewis, who endured horrific beatings, threats to his life, and imprisonment as one of the original Freedom Riders, at Black Lives Matter Plaza.

Rep. Lewis is the only surviving speaker of the March On Washington where Dr. King gave his ‘I Have A Dream Speech’ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ7UXD-UEAAyDa3.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ7UXEcUMAAV7Dm.jpg

RT @MoveOn Thousands gathered in solidarity in Austin, TX today to demand justice for those killed at the hands of the police, including Mike Ramos who was murdered on April 24. #BlackLivesMatter #DefundThePolice http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ8AXXKU0AANaSQ.jpg

We are in a moral moment in our country that must be met with substantive change to our system of policing—and tomorrow we will formally introduce comprehensive legislation to do just that. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1269651620230574080/img/FgaOIcwNOvfexQo0.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269651620230574080/vid/480x270/kevUAGKbjmZZEkhF.mp4?tag=13

RT @ABC7News PROTEST CROWD: Thousands of people marched down Constitution Avenue Northwest as Washington, D.C. attracted massive crowds over protests of racial injustice.

https://wjla.com/news/local/saturday-protest-washington-dc-black-lives-matter-george-floyd http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269425686202191873/pu/img/8E05SQsO_s60QRBR.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269425686202191873/pu/vid/480x270/RgeJ2z-7Q8WapPVc.mp4?tag=10

RT @brianstelter Trump tells us not to believe our eyes AGAIN: He says there was a "much smaller crowd in D.C. than anticipated."

It's worth keeping track of every time he tries to deny what we can all see for ourselves. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ6hge_XYAEJb6H.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269629727708459009/vid/480x270/6gIMK-N6KSSwlZ-d.mp4?tag=13

We cannot let up in the fight for equality, fairness, and justice. Even when—if not especially when—it is hard or uncomfortable to talk about. Together we can be a force for change.
https://www.cosmopolitan.com/politics/a32766156/kamala-harris-black-lives-matter-protests/

RT @ACLU 10 million students attend schools with cops, but no social workers.

It doesn't have to be this way. https://www.aclu.org/report/cops-and-no-counselors?initms_aff=nat&initms_chan=soc&utm_medium=soc&initms=200607_report_tw&utm_source=tw&utm_campaign=&utm_content=200607_criminallaw_report&ms_aff=nat&ms_chan=soc&ms=200607_report_tw

RT @jtknoxroxs Sign his name! We chanted and signed George Floyd’s name along with Deafies For Black Lives! #BlackDisabledLivesMatter http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269371059154845701/pu/img/3_66InB8G5IxGi_1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269371059154845701/pu/vid/320x568/3LYTNZKMOuXDniHi.mp4?tag=10

“A new world is not only possible, she is on her way.”

- Arundhati Roy https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1269755811536015360 QT @nytimes Breaking News: A veto-proof majority of the Minneapolis City Council pledged to dismantle the city’s Police Department, vowing to create a new public safety system https://trib.al/WSryDgh http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ8ULkEXgAYwFS_.jpg

This is unethical. https://twitter.com/public_citizen/status/1269648445033320449 QT @Public_Citizen The NYPD’s budget is $6,000,000,000

That’s more than the city spends on health, homelessness, youth development and workforce development combined.

RT @AyannaPressley Know y/our history, American history, don't sanitize or whitewash it. You can't celebrate Dr. King & in the same breath rebuke #BLM There will be unrest in our streets for as long as there is unrest in our lives. We are following the blueprint: organize, mobilize, legislate. https://twitter.com/RashidaTlaib/status/1269656637113020417 QT @RashidaTlaib Transformative change starts with us in the streets demanding it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ65-u-XsAMjiNm.jpg
Black Lives Matter. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ8WrK9XQAItOXD.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ8WrK7XYAALjTS.jpg

We need more of this.
http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269742303469600771/pu/img/abIcCoK6x3Z7TjMP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269742303469600771/pu/vid/480x270/8bp6CRkQ4ks7x5L-.mp4?tag=10

Never doubt that our nation’s youth are going to change the world.
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/teen-girls-organized-10000-person-black-lives-matter-protest-nashville_n_5eda8f78c5b62f530c799daa

RT @BreeNewsome The political establishment will attempt to take a small amount of $ from these enormous police budgets, transfer it to a handful of chosen programs they view as least threatening to the status quo, & then claim they addressed structural racism. Please don’t let them do that.

During our campaign, I got to meet Ally. This #PrideMonth, I’m thinking of her and the entire LGBTQ+ community. No matter your sexual orientation or color of your skin, we will leave no one to fight alone.
http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7saZSEX4AAmIPS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1133527610619772928/vid/320x320/oPhm_V9UoIM85g8X.mp4?tag=12

Unbelievable courage and strength from Ahmaud Arbery and Breonna Taylor’s mothers during these times. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269437850069749762/pu/img/-J8ckzCSU1cLHR17.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269437850069749762/pu/vid/320x320/oc1BhyxnysqnGBbN.mp4?tag=10

Their silence is deafening. We're coming together at a very difficult time for America. We need real leadership – backed up by real action.

Another reason why we *must* strengthen our House Democratic Majority, take back the Senate & elect Joe Biden. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1269779302943461378/pu/img/AJY2wnIHtyg1pAKn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1269779302943461378/pu/vid/480x270/RWxdfvgoUy99Ka5H.mp4?tag=10

RT @SenatorTimScott Great to discuss important issues with my friend, @TGowdySC. Defunding the police would cause harm to our most vulnerable, but clearly, REFORM IS NEEDED! My upcoming George Floyd and Walter Scott Notification Act requires officers to report on shootings & use of force incidents. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EZ7c7yKX0AAIc7g.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1269684398351364101/vid/480x270/WWlU0zAYLoIlip8j.mp4?tag=13

More evidence of organized agitators from a variety of extremists groups

Police arrested a self identified member of a group which “actively recruits people to violently protest the government” for vandalizing police cars at protests last week in Miami

 https://www.miamiherald.com/news/local/crime/article243346866.html#storylink=cpy

The time for change is now. Change in the name of George Floyd. Change in the name of Ahmaud Arbery. Change in the name of Breonna Taylor. And change in the name of the countless other Black Americans who have died at the hands of hatred and racism.
